Replace.Text: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your Civlization is in [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy for {1_Turns} more turn(s). During [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy, the Civlization will not gain any [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, or [ICON_PEACE] Faith, and cities have no [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to build anything with[ENDCOLOR].
